reviewText: One of my personal favs. The sexy brown eyed, dark haired,  Monique Gabrielle bares it all in this hot cop thriller. She plays a gorgeous and tough as nails FBI agent who despite cautions from her boss, decides to single handedly, one at a time, take the crooks out! This  brunette is as deadly with her hands and feet as she is with a gun. She pummels the bad guys..I mean pummel! In her first action scene a baddie is trying to mow her over with his car. She quickly reacts by running head on straight for the car. At the last possible second she performs an awesome flying jump kick right thru the dash window landing her foot right into the drivers throat! In another eye popping seen an assassin is sent to break into her house and take her out. However he has no idea who he is messing with. Much to the intruder's surprise, the scantily clad femme fatale sneaks up on him after she comes out of the shower. Clothed only in a silk robe with all out cleavage, she kicks the living crap out of him with an array of bare foot kicks and karate chops that send him reeling thru the sliding glass door. Needless to say, he didn't survive the well deserved beating and nor does the rest of his ciminal brood. While not much of an actress (but who cares!)  the former playmate Monique Gabrielle shows off her best "assets" combining beauty with lethal moves into a very entertaining package.
